text: 2:4 Aposel 20:31Guizbangɨra, kɨ ia bagha akɨnafarim osirir dughiamɨn, kɨ bar ian apangkuvigha, nan navim bar osemezɨ, kɨ puvɨram azi. Kɨ osɨmtɨzim ia danɨngasa akɨnafarir kam osirizir puvatɨ. Kɨ ghaze, ia kamaghɨn fogh suam, kɨ bar ia gifuegha, bar uan navim ia ganɨngi. Kamaghɨn kɨ ia bagha osiri.
